title: Messaging system not working.
body: I have a friend on my list who can message me outside of game but i can not message him from in game. I keep getting the  "hes not on my friend-list" (i re added him, still not working) this happened for just him on my old and new client. Im also having a issue where whenever i log on i have message notifications of messages i have already received and seen from my clubs.

replies.body: Does this friend have a special character in their name? We've seen this issue happen quite often if a player had an unsupported character for the region.
He has a space in his name but i been able to message people who did have a space
A normal space, such as in my name or somewhere else? We've seen spaces elsewhere in summoner names these issues. Can you provide me their summoner name so I can take a look?
So you're seeing a space in their summoner name between 'fancypants' and 67 on your side?
Sorry its taking me awhile to reply, im off and on sometimes. yes on my side for me he has a space

It seems that this may be an issue with your friend's summoner name rather than something from your side. I'd recommend having your friend submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can sort this out with them.

If you have any other questions, let me know.
